name: Dune Master
description:
Go on a jurney trough desert that might have been something else...once..before "he" came and turned everything into desolation. Battle enemies with help of your Whip of Chaos and artifact, that makes you temporarily invincible and allows you to move to your previous position.

My first game ever..i mean EVER! I hope you enjoy it at least as much as I enjoyed creating it with help of this wonderful comunity. I welcome any comments.
